Expedition_lead.help_tip: Name of leader and Underground Explorer grant winner

Collaborators.help_tip: List of names of local collaborators for this project. (Max 150 char)

Primer_set_1.help_tip: First primer set used for amplicon sequencing, if applicable.

Primer_set_2.help_tip: Secondary primer set used for amplicon sequencing, if applicable.

Extraction_method.help_tip: Kit or protocol used for DNA extraction. ‘Conventional extraction’ refers to a laboratory protocol using common buffers and solutions (such a SDS, phenol). Conventional extraction, CTAB refers to a laboratory protocol using common buffers and solutions in addition to the CTAB buffer.

Multiple_sequencing_runs.help_tip: Were your samples run across multiple sequencing runs (if known)?
